modName: Crimson and Dark Crimson textures for Dynasty Armor
descriptionHtml:
[color=Crimson]Crimson and Dark Crimson textures for Dynasty Armor[/color]

Many thanks to Simomax who gave me the permission to add some
crimson color on his white retexture and
many thanks to Codecrackerx9 and ken1945 who gave me the permission
to make this crimson retexture for their armor and upload it. ^^

Required mod:
Codecrackerx9's and ken1945's Dynasty Armor
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5733


Crimson textures

Description:
Replaces the Dynasty Armor textures with crimson textures on the white one.

Installation:
First you need the Dynasty Armor to install, then
extract the crimson and copy the folder "textures" to
C:Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData
and replace all.


Dark Crimson texures for Dynasty Armor

Description:
Replaces the Dynasty Armor textures with dark crimson textures.

Installation:
First you need the Dynasty Armor to install, then
extract the crimson and copy the folder "textures" to
C:Program FilesSteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData
and replace all.


Crimson and Dark Crimson textures made by haldir307.

Permissions:
1) Users/Modders are not allowed to upload my files to other sites!
2) Users/Modders are not allowed to convert my file so that it works on similar games!
3) Users/Modders are not allowed to modify my file including releasing bug fixes or improving on the features my file adds to the game and upload it as a seperate file!
4) Users/Modders are not allowed to use assets contained in my files in their own files!
[b][i]5) Translations are allowed, no need to ask me.Â [/i][/b]
[b][i][u]6) Users/Modders are not allowed to upload my mods on Steam Workshop as their own to obtain money and it means the same for Permissions 2/3/4, my mods will always stay on nexus for free![/u][/i][/b]

Credits:
All credits goes to Codecrackerx9, ken1945, Simomax. Can endorsed my mod if you want. xD
author: haldir307 - Simomax - Codecrackerx9 and ken1945
